item.title: Books I'm Reading Now [Sept. 24, 2020]
item.description: Time to talk about book I’m reading. On thing that I’m trying to do is have a few ‘active’ books, so I can have a change. Also, I’m trying to split my reads in 3 categories: fiction, non-fiction, and learning. The list below is a good example of that.
